title: DEVELOPMENT.md references missing npm script type-check
description: DEVELOPMENT.md instructs contributors to run npm run type-check, but type-check is not defined in package.json. This breaks onboarding and standard QA workflows.
evidence: Line 848: 'Check TypeScript errors: npm run type-check'
Line 986: '[ ] Type check passes (npm run type-check)'
package.json scripts do not include 'type-check' (validated via scripts/check-content-accuracy.js)

steps: Either add a type-check script to package.json (e.g., tsc --noEmit) OR update documentation to reference the existing equivalent command.
Re-run docs accuracy tooling to confirm it passes.

title: AUDIT_TRACKER.md references missing npm script review:reset
description: AUDIT_TRACKER.md documents a script (npm run review:reset) that does not exist in package.json, which blocks the documented audit workflow.
evidence: package.json scripts do not include 'review:reset' (validated via scripts/check-content-accuracy.js)

steps: Update AUDIT_TRACKER.md to reference the correct existing script (if renamed), or implement review:reset in package.json.

title: DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md contains broken links to missing src/dataconnect-generated docs
description: DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md links to generated documentation paths under src/dataconnect-generated/... that do not exist in the repository. This makes the main index misleading and creates dead navigation.
evidence: Confirmed: no src/ directory exists in repo root

steps: Remove these entries from DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md OR update them to correct existing location.

title: Misleading link text in ROADMAP.md (post-migration artifact)
description: ROADMAP.md link text says 'docs/audits/canonical/' but points to 'docs/technical-debt/' due to TDMS migration. Path is correct but text is outdated, causing confusion for readers expecting canonical structure.
evidence: Result of TDMS migration from canonical/ to technical-debt/ naming

steps: 1. Open ROADMAP.md line 15
2. Update link text to match current path: 'docs/technical-debt/'
3. Search ROADMAP.md for other instances of 'canonical' terminology
4. Update any other outdated references
verification: Grep for 'canonical' in ROADMAP.md and verify all references updated
Visual inspection of ROADMAP.md rendered markdown

title: 498 external URLs need validation (expected 60-100 failures)
description: 498 external URLs across 100+ files haven't been validated recently. Script exists (npm run docs:external-links) but needs execution. Expected 20-30% failure rate based on domain analysis.
evidence: Script exists: scripts/check-external-links.js with SSRF protection

steps: 1. Run: npm run docs:external-links
2. Triage results for S0/S1 severity broken links
3. Fix or remove broken links in critical docs
4. Set up monthly automated validation

title: ROADMAP.md anchor fragility risk (43 dependent documents)
description: ROADMAP.md has 43 inbound links from other documents, making it the most-linked-to file. Any anchor name changes would break navigation from 43+ locations. No anchor stability policy documented.
evidence: Risk: Renaming sections breaks 43+ dependent documents

steps: 1. Create anchor stability policy for high-traffic documents
2. Add CI validation for anchor changes
3. Document current anchors in high-traffic files
verification: CI check added to pre-commit or GitHub Actions

title: Skills SKILL.md files use wrong relative paths — 64 broken links
description: Skills at .claude/skills/X/SKILL.md use ../../ to reference root files but that resolves to .claude/, not the repo root. They need ../../../. Similarly, bare docs/ paths resolve to .claude/skills/X/docs/ instead of the actual docs/ directory. Systematic error affecting 11+ skill files with 64 total broken links.
evidence: 64 broken links found across 11 skill SKILL.md files
../../ from .claude/skills/X/ resolves to .claude/ not repo root
bare docs/ references resolve to .claude/skills/X/docs/ instead of repo docs/

steps: Systematic find-and-replace across 11 skill files: ../../ → ../../../ and docs/ → ../../../docs/
verification: All skill file links resolve correctly

title: 38 ghost npm scripts referenced in docs but not defined in package.json
description: 38 unique npm scripts are referenced in documentation but not defined in package.json. Most-referenced ghosts include dev:offline (20 refs), type-check (10 refs), doctor (7 refs), setup (7 refs), smoke (7 refs), typecheck (5 refs). This breaks onboarding and documented workflows.
evidence: dev:offline referenced 20 times across ROADMAP, DEVELOPMENT, audits
type-check referenced 10 times in DEVELOPMENT, skills
doctor referenced 7 times in ROADMAP, DEVELOPMENT
setup referenced 7 times in audits, DEVELOPMENT
smoke referenced 7 times in ROADMAP, audits
38 unique ghost scripts total with ~100 total references

steps: Triage each of 38 scripts: decide implement vs. remove reference
Update all referencing docs for removed scripts
Add scripts to package.json for implemented ones
verification: All documented npm run commands exist in package.json

title: SESSION_CONTEXT.md at 71KB contains 136+ session summaries — needs aggressive trimming
description: SESSION_CONTEXT.md is 71,736 bytes. Per its own purpose ('Quick session-to-session handoff'), it should contain only the last 3-5 session summaries. Currently it retains sessions #120-136+ inline (16+ sessions). Older sessions should be in ROADMAP_LOG.md or docs/SESSION_HISTORY.md. This bloats every session start read and wastes AI context window tokens.
evidence: docs/SESSION_HISTORY.md exists (5,980 bytes) but old sessions not moved there

steps: 1. Move sessions older than 5 sessions (≤#131) to docs/SESSION_HISTORY.md or ROADMAP_LOG.md
2. Keep only sessions #132-136 in SESSION_CONTEXT.md
3. Target file size: <15KB
verification: Older session summaries preserved in SESSION_HISTORY.md

title: ROADMAP.md at 155KB is a god document — should be split by milestone
description: ROADMAP.md is 155,433 bytes (the 2nd largest file after DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md). With 16 milestones, dependency chains, completion tracking, and detailed item lists, this single file has become unwieldy. Each milestone could be its own doc linked from a summary. The file takes excessive AI context tokens and is a merge conflict magnet.
evidence: Document Version 3.17, covering M0 through M10+
Milestones overview table has 16 rows with sub-milestones
ROADMAP_FUTURE.md (20,870 bytes) and ROADMAP_LOG.md (28,289 bytes) already exist as companion docs

steps: 1. Keep ROADMAP.md as a summary (Milestones Overview table, dependency graph, active sprint details only)
2. Move M2-M10 detailed breakdowns to docs/plans/ROADMAP_M2.md etc.
3. Link from the summary to individual milestone docs
4. Target ROADMAP.md at <40KB
verification: All milestone details accessible via links

title: APPCHECK_SETUP.md contradicts current code — App Check is disabled in lib/firebase.ts
description: APPCHECK_SETUP.md line 14 states: 'As of PR1, all journal and inventory Cloud Functions require App Check verification. The app will not function without proper App Check configuration.' However, from the prior refactoring audit, App Check initialization in lib/firebase.ts is entirely commented out (marked 'TEMPORARILY DISABLED' since Dec 2025). The doc says the app won't work without it, but the app IS working without it — meaning the doc is dangerously misleading about the current security posture.
evidence: docs/APPCHECK_SETUP.md:14-15: 'all journal and inventory Cloud Functions require App Check verification'
Prior refactoring audit confirmed lib/firebase.ts:57-90 has App Check block commented out
App Check has been disabled since Dec 2025, current date is Feb 2026

steps: 1. Add a PROMINENT banner to APPCHECK_SETUP.md stating App Check is CURRENTLY DISABLED
2. Add 'Current Status: DISABLED since [date]' to the document header
3. Reference the re-enablement plan (DEBT-0854 / Track S / M4.5)
4. Update Architecture Notes section to reflect current code state
verification: No claims that App Check is required for current operations

title: docs/SoNash_Technical_Ideation_Multi_AI 1.20.26.md has space in filename
description: The filename contains spaces, requiring URL-encoding (%20) in links. At 169,491 bytes it's also extremely large. Spaces in filenames cause issues with some tooling (markdownlint, grep, shell scripts) and break simple markdown links. This violates standard naming conventions.

steps: 1. Rename to docs/SoNash_Technical_Ideation_Multi_AI_1.20.26.md (replace spaces with underscores)
2. Better: archive to docs/archive/ as it's a dated ideation document from Jan 2026
3. Update any references

title: DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md references src/dataconnect-generated/ docs that may not exist
description: The auto-generated index lists 4 docs under src/dataconnect-generated/: setup.md, usage.md, react/README.md, README.md. These are likely auto-generated by Firebase Data Connect and may have been removed when that feature was disabled, but they're still indexed because the generator found them. If they don't exist on disk, they create broken entries.

steps: 1. Verify src/dataconnect-generated/ exists and contains these files
2. If the directory exists: add it to docs:index exclude list (it's auto-generated code)
3. If it doesn't exist: remove the @dataconnect/generated dependency from package.json
verification: npm run docs:index no longer lists auto-generated SDK docs
Or: src/dataconnect-generated/ is in the exclude list for the index generator
